Gastric Sleeve Surgery (Gastrectomy)

Sleeve gastrectomy, commonly known as gastric sleeve surgery, is a type of bariatric surgical procedure that involves the removal of a significant portion of the stomach, resulting in a slim, tube-like structure known as a "sleeve." By reducing the size of the stomach, this surgery restricts calorie intake and diminishes feelings of hunger. It is primarily recommended for individuals with clinically severe obesity to facilitate substantial weight loss.

Who Are We?

Pendik Yüzyıl Hospital provides services with a long-standing medical experience and bariatric surgery specialists who have accomplished many successful operations. We set out to provide the highest quality healthcare services to our patients.

With 15 years of bariatric surgery experience, we have a team specialized in obesity and metabolic surgery as one of the leading hospitals in Turkey. We have performed more than 15,000 operations to date, helping our patients improve their quality of life.

The health and safety of our patients is always our top priority. With our modern infrastructure and expert doctors, we offer personalized treatment approaches to each of our patients. We aim to provide you with the best service by ensuring that you are in a comfortable and safe environment throughout your treatment.

As Pendik Yüzyıl Hospital, we remain committed to providing healthcare services in accordance with scientific and technical standards. You can quickly reach our hospital located in a central location of Istanbul. Contact us for a health experience that offers customized solutions for your needs.

What is Gastric Sleeve Surgery?

Gastric Sleeve Surgery, also referred to as sleeve gastrectomy, is a surgical procedure designed to promote weight loss in individuals grappling with obesity. This surgery involves reducing the size of the stomach and restricting food intake. This allows patients to consume fewer calories and feel fuller, thereby supporting the weight loss process. During the surgery, about 80% of the patient's stomach is removed by a surgical team. The remaining stomach is reshaped into a "sleeve" or tube-like structure. This leads to a decrease in stomach capacity and the development of a feeling of fullness with smaller portions.

Frequently Asked Questions

You can ask any questions you may have about the surgery.

Show More

How does it help with weight loss?

By reducing the size of the stomach, gastric sleeve surgery limits the amount of food you can eat, leading to reduced calorie intake and weight loss.

What are the advantages of this surgery?

Some advantages include a reduction in the risk of weight-related health issues, improved quality of life, and increased self-confidence

How long does the surgery take?

The surgery typically takes about 1-2 hours.

Is it reversible?

Gastric sleeve surgery is not easily reversible, as it involves the permanent removal of a portion of the stomach.

Is dietary support provided after the surgery?

We provide our patients with free dietitian support for three months and medical support for up to one year after the surgery.

Can I eat normally after the surgery?

Your diet will need to be modified after surgery, starting with a liquid diet and gradually progressing to solid foods.

Our Services

Hair Transplant

Hair transplantation is a surgical procedure used to solve the problem of hair loss or baldness. This procedure involves removing hair follicles from denser areas and transplanting them to areas with thinning or balding hair. Hair transplantation is often preferred for aesthetic reasons and is used to achieve a fuller and more natural hair appearance.

Our Services

Dental Surgery

Dental surgery is a surgical medical specialty used in the treatment of various oral and dental health problems. This includes various procedures such as tooth extractions, implant placements and gum surgery. Dental surgery is used to improve patients' oral health, address dental aesthetic problems and replace lost teeth.

Read More
Our Services

Eye Surgery

Eye surgery is a surgical intervention to improve or correct eye health. These surgeries are commonly used to treat eye problems such as cataracts, laser vision correction or eye pressure. Eye surgeries are performed by specialist ophthalmologists and usually provide safe and effective results.

Read More
Our Services

Plastic Surgery

Plastic surgery is a medical specialty that includes surgical procedures to improve or correct body shape or appearance. Aesthetic plastic surgery includes procedures based on people's aesthetic preferences, while reconstructive plastic surgery is used to treat wounds caused by injury, correct congenital anomaly or repair tissue loss after cancer. Plastic surgery is performed by specialized plastic surgeons and plays an important role in patients' physical and emotional recovery. Read More

Dr. Deniz Dagdelen was born on 21.02.1989 in Istanbul. He received his medical education at Kocaeli University Faculty of Medicine between 2008-2014. After completing his education, he started his dermatology assistantship at Göztepe Training and Research Hospital in 2019 as his first place of duty.

After completing his 4-year education towards the end of 2019, he started to work as a dermatology specialist at Bingöl State Hospital.

After working here for 2.5 years, he returned to Istanbul and started working in the private sector. He improved himself even more by participating in various national congresses, dermocosmetic courses and proficiency exams both during his education and specialization period.

Dr. Deniz Dagdelen was born on 21.02.1989 in Istanbul. He received his medical education at Kocaeli University Faculty of Medicine between 2008-2014. After completing his education, he started his dermatology assistantship at Göztepe Training and Research Hospital in 2019 as his first place of duty.

After completing his 4-year education towards the end of 2019, he started to work as a dermatology specialist at Bingöl State Hospital.

After working here for 2.5 years, he returned to Istanbul and started working in the private sector. He improved himself even more by participating in various national congresses, dermocosmetic courses and proficiency exams both during his education and specialization period.
